sentences.en: He was at the problem confronting him, weighted down the incubus of his working - class station.
sentences.cn: 眼前面临的问题叫他恐怖了.他那 工人阶级 的处境像梦宽一样压着他.

sentences.en: Joyce regarded his US citizenship as a moral and political incubus.
sentences.cn: 乔伊斯认为他的美国公民身份在道德上和政治上是很大的负担。

trans.tran_cn: 梦淫妖，噩梦，像噩梦压迫着人的事物，精神压力
trans.tran_en: someone or something that causes a lot of worries or problems
